l2-1.title: All about that WOMEN
l2-1.shortIntro: Exploring how women interact and collaborate via AI/technology-aided communication in online communities.

details.fullDesc: I am a woman. I care about women. However, women are not adequately cared by the world. Therefore, as a women, I become an observer of the world from a women's perspective, and try to make more women be seen and heard by the world. In this thread of project, I explore how technology can help women become visible and empowered, also how the solidarity in the women community can be cultivated and strengthened, especially in the context of Chinese social media and online communities.

l2-1.title: Obeservation of the Interesting Netizens
l2-1.shortIntro: Exploring how women interact and collaborate via AI/technology-aided communication in online communities.

details.fullDesc: The world-wide-web is an umbrella that covers all kinds of people, and the internet is a mirror that reflects the diversity of human beings. In this thread of project, I observe and explore the interesting netizens in the world-wide-web, especially the sub-communities like online immigrants induced by platform regulations, and the fans who found parasocial relationships much easier to build and enjoy in the current era of AI and technology. By understanding their interactions and needs, I hope to design better technological support for them to interact with the world and with each other in a more empowered way.

l2-2.title: Human-Compatible Interactions in Real-World
l2-2.shortIntro: Exploring modeling and designing interactions with realworld objects that are compatible with human knowledge and values based on affordances.

details.fullDesc: Though virtual intelligence is booming, the physical world is still the main stage for human interactions. In this thread of project, I explore how to model and design interactions with objects in a way that compatible with human values and perceptions based on objects' affordances. By understanding how people perceive and interact with objects in the physical world, I hope to develop agents that could behave the same way as humans do and design new interactions approach with digital devices that are natural and empowering for people in their daily lives.

l2-2.title: Facilitating Human-Human Interaction in Real-World
l2-2.shortIntro: Exploring how robots or intelligent agents can facilitate and enhance human-human interaction.

details.fullDesc: Besides the interactions between human and objects, human-human interaction is also a fundamental part of human life in this physical world. In this thread of project, I explore how to design and develop robots or intelligent agents that can facilitate and enhance human-human interaction, especially in face-to-face scenarios. By understanding the dynamics of human-human interaction and the potential role of technology in it, I hope to integrate technology seamlessly into human social contexts and promote more effective and enjoyable interactions among people.

l2-2.title: Human-Robot Teaming
l2-2.shortIntro: Exploring how robots or intelligent agents can collaborate with humans in common human-human interaction scenarios.

details.fullDesc: Beyond assistant or facilitator, technology can also be a teammate that collaborates with humans in common human-human interaction scenarios. In this thread of project, I explore how robots or intelligent agents may collaborate with humans, especially in teamwork scenarios. Based on the understanding of human-human interaction, I hope to explore (1) what kind of role and function a robot or intelligent agent may uniquely play in a human-robot team and how such roles may influence human perception and behavior, and (2) how to align the way to make contributions in group work between the robot or intelligent agent and the human teammates, so that the robot or intelligent agent can be a more compatible and effective teammate for humans in their daily life and work.

l2-3.title: Human-Self Interaction through Physical Experience
l2-3.shortIntro: Exploring how human can interact with themselves with the help of physical intelligent companions.

details.fullDesc: This is a direction currently in its early stage and I am still exploring the research questions and design space. I am driven to explore how technology can help humans interact with themselves because of myself. I have experienced depression and anxiety at the beginning of my PhD journey and I am still trying to cope with them in the best way. During my fight against those emotions, I found that the interactions with myself are crucial. However, I am not always in a good condition to interact with myself in a positive way. Therefore, I am interested in exploring how technology can help facilitate human-self interaction, especially through physical experience with embodied and physical interfaces such as robots and interactive objects.
